item.title: Crazy deal! Samsung Galaxy S20 FE 5G available at 53% off; price can drop to 16940 on Amazon
item.description: Amazon is offering a 53 percent discount on Samsung Galaxy S20 FE 5G along with exchange and bank offer. Check price details here.

item.title: Poco X5 Pro launching today: Watch it Live- Know time, expected price, specifications here
item.description: Poco X5 Pro 5G will be launching today and the event can be watched live on YouTube. Know live stream time, expected price, specifications and other details of the phone here.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S23 pricey? Check Galaxy A53, phone's price just fell from 40999 to 16999
item.description: Samsung Galaxy S23 is definitely pricey and may not be ideal for you, but don't despair, here is a Samsung phone that you can definitely flaunt and you won't have to pay through your nose.

item.title: Best camera smartphones under 30000: Nothing Phone 1, Oppo F21 Pro, Google Pixel 6a, more
item.description: A budget of Rs. 30000 can give you a choice of several excellent camera smartphones. Google Pixel 6a, Nothing Phone 1, Oppo F21 Pro, and more.

item.title: Unreal! Samsung Galaxy M33 5G price drops to just 1549 from 24999; Make it happen this way
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy M33 5G smartphone worth Rs. 24999 has received a massive price drop on Amazon. The phone can be availed for just Rs. 1549 on Amazon today. Check discount and exchange offer here.

item.title: MASSIVE Apple iPhone 12 discount rolled out! Price drops to Rs. 41850 against 65900 earlier
item.description: Apple iPhone 12 price drop has been announced on Amazon. You can grab a discount and exchange offers on the device today. Check price drop offers here.

item.title: Save over 22000 on Samsung Galaxy F23 5G! Price can drop to as low as 1149- Here's how
item.description: You can avail 29 percent discount along with exchange offer to bring down the cost of the Samsung Galaxy F23 5G down to Rs. 1149 on Flipkart today.

item.title: iPhone 14 price drop alert! Get it for just 45499 against 79900
item.description: iPhone 14 is now available at an amazingly low price! Get it for just Rs. 45499 on Flipkart, check how.
